author: Christine Eibner and Dr. Courtney Gidengil, Opinion Contributors
title: What if Supreme Court strikes down Obamacare during pandemic?
description: If the Supreme Court overturns the ACA, the social burden of COVID-19 could become even more devastating.
content: With COVID-19 spreading across the United States, the fate of the Affordable Care Act (ACA) is once again up in the air, hanging on the outcome of a Supreme Court case. Should the law be overturned, upwards of 20 million people could lose their health insuran… [+4527 chars]
